Document:
# Aberrant Flesh
A shambling mass of flesh, animated by anomalous energy. Although the anomaly that created them has long vanished, these creatures are resilient enough to survive on their own. Not much is known about their life cycle or biological makeup; however, it is clear that they will attack and attempt to assimilate any biological life forms and will attack anything they consider a threat.
For the most part, aberrant flesh monsters utilize brute force and numerical advantage to eliminate threats. However, some of them have developed means of inflicting damage from a distance.
# Known variants # "Jared"
"Jareds" are mindless brutes who attempt to close the distance without any concern for their survival. They seem to be more fragile than the average human.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 50 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s)[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 8 [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
[bold][color=#a4885c]*[/color][/bold] - [italic]an average healthy unburdened human being's run (walk) speed is 4.5 m/s (2.5 m/s).[/italic]
# "Golem"
Similar to "Jareds," "Golems" are mindless brutes, but they appear to have a heavier build, making them slightly more resilient than "Jareds," but less agile at the same time.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 70 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 8 [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
# "Clamp"
"Clamps" are flying variants that have developed mutations enabling them to shoot biological projectiles, such as [color=#a4885c]bone spikes[/color] containing naturally secreted [color=lime]gastro toxins[/color] or small living organisms known simply as [color=#a4885c]"maws"[/color].
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 40 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 6 [color=yellow]Piercing[/color], 6 [color=lime]Toxin[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier, Shooter: bone spike / maw
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 40 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 4 [color=red]Slash[/color] (maw) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier, Shooter: bone spike / maw
# "Maw"
Immobile, flesh-boring creatures that attach themselves to victims and start gnawing their way inside
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 12 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 0 m/s (0 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 4 [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
# "Lover"
The "Lover" shares similarities with "Jareds" and "Golems", but it is capable of flying and has a considerably more fragile stature.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 30 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.5 m/s (3 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 8 [color=red]Blunt[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] Flier
# "Horror"
Tougher and more resilient than the average aberrant flesh monster, the aberrant flesh horror possesses sharp bone protrusions and highly developed musculature, allowing it to rend the flesh of its victims and tear through armor with efficiency.
- [bold][color=#a4885c]Health thresholds:[/color][/bold] 200 (death) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Run (walk) speed:[/color][/bold] 3.8 m/s (3.8 m/s) - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage (type):[/color][/bold] 12 [color=red]Slash[/color] - [bold][color=#a4885c]Damage resistances:[/color][/bold] None - [bold][color=#a4885c]Special abilities:[/color][/bold] None
# Missions targets ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]aberrant flesh horror[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]flesh clumps[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
